Class-Oracle 20 -- Male Skilled Human Oracle: 20
Strength: +4 Dexterity: +5 Constitution: +3 Intelligence: +4 Wisdom: +4 Charisma: +4
Background: Astrologer Deity: Pharasma
Experience: 19968/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Curse Of Inclement Headwinds: Cursebound 4 inflicts -10 Speed
Lighter Than Air: Cursebound gives 25' fly Speed, or 35' fly Speed with cursebound 3
Water Walker: Cursebound 1 allows Striding across liquids to a solid destination, and cursebound 2 allows walking on liquids as if they were solid

Oracle Feats: Class Feats (Choose 10 from any)
Skill Feats: Skill Feats (Choose 10 from any)
Tempest: Has the Curse Of Inclement Headwinds feature
Tempest: Has the Foretell Harm feature
Adopted Ancestry (Tripkee): Can take Tripkee ancestry feats
Curse Of Engulfing Flames: Shows aspects of heat and flame
Curse Of Inclement Headwinds: Shows aspects of weather
Curse Of Living Death: Shows aspects of death and decay
Curse Of Outpouring Life: Presence causes minor healing and vitality effects
Curse Of The Mortal Warrior: Smells of steel and blood and appears more muscular than actual
Curse Of The Sky's Call: Has eyes that glow and hair and clothing that floats
Curse Of Torrential Knowledge: Shows effects of overflowing knowledge
Extreme Curse: Can tolerate cursebound severity 4
Forestall Curse: (F) Subsequent cursebound ability use does not increase cursebound severity once per day
Major Curse: Can tolerate cursebound severity 3
Oracular Curse: Suffers from a mystery-linked curse and a cursebound condition
Pet: Has a Tiny animal minion with the same level, modifiers, and AC as self, 100 Hit Points, low-light vision, 25' Speed, and creature-specific abilities
Perception: +28 (wisdom; expert)

Skill Training (Thievery): Skill Trained (Thievery)
Skilled Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Tempest: Skill Trained (Nature)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
A Home In Every Port: Can use 8 hr interaction in a town or village to obtain free lodging for self and 6 allies for 1 dy
Clever Improviser: Can attempt any skill untrained
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures to Aid with expert skills are successes
Curse Of Torrential Knowledge: Cursebound inflicts a penalty to Perception of equal severity
Deceptive Worship: Can use Occultism to Lie when claiming membership in another faith
Dubious Knowledge: Normal failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the normal income
Glean Lore: (1) Successful Religion check gives 1 true and 1 false piece of info about a desired topic, critical success gives accurate info or a clue, and failure or critical failure gives 1 or 2 pieces of incorrect info or misleading clues
Group Aid: (F) After Aiding an ally, Aids another on the same skill
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Oddity Identification: +2 Occultism to Identify Magic with a fortune, mental, possession, prediction, or scrying trait
Root Magic: Talisman given to an ally during daily prep gives +2 on first save that day vs. a spell or haunt
Schooled In Secrets: Can use Occultism to Gather Information about secret societies and to Impersonate a member
Spiritual Sense: Makes an automatic check to find spirit creatures while exploring, and can notice spirits within 30' that are up to 5' deep within objects
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge on a trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Combat
Hit Points: 228 Armor Class: 39 (dexterity (5 max); expert) Class DC: Oracle: 36 (charisma; trained)
Armor: Explorer's Clothing Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Club (+28 1d6+4 B R10'; strength; expert); Crossbow (+29 1d8 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Gauntlet (+28 1d4+4 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +5
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +5
Light Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry (Bastard Sword): Weapon Familiarity (Bastard Sword)
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Bespell Strikes: (F) Casting a non-cantrip spell causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d6 HP until the end of the turn once per turn; the damage type is force or the same type as the spell inflicted
Curse Of Ancestral Meddling: Cursebound inflicts clumsy of equal severity
Curse Of Engulfing Flames: Cursebound inflicts persistent fire damage of equal severity
Curse Of Inclement Headwinds: Cursebound 2 inflicts -2 ranged attacks
Curse Of Outpouring Life: Regains 20 * cursebound severity fewer Hit Points from magical healing
Curse Of The Sky's Call: Cursebound inflicts enfeebled of equal severity
Curse Of Torrential Knowledge: Cursebound 4 prevents communication and inflicts stupefied 1
Debilitating Dichotomy: (2) (Cursebound) R30' Inflicts 27d6 HP mental on self and target (save basic Fortitude; self improves save by 1 step; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1)
Oracular Warning: (F) (Cursebound) R20' At the start of initiative, gives allies +2 initiative, or +3 or +4 initiative with cursebound 2 or 3, and 10 temporary Hit Points for 1 min
Thousand Visions: (F) (Cursebound) R30' Can target concealed or hidden creatures with no flat check or a DC 5 flat check, does not suffer off-guard from hidden creatures, and senses beyond 30' become imprecise, for 1 min
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Whispers Of Weakness: (1) (Cursebound) R60' Reveals target weakness and its lowest saving throw and gives self +2 to the next attack before the end of the turn once per target per day
Save: Fortitude: +27 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +29 (dexterity; expert); Will: +32 (wisdom; legendary)
Save Notes:
Greater Mysterious Resolve: Save Legendary (Will)
Magical Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Mysterious Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Premonition's Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Curse Of Inclement Headwinds: Cursebound 1 and 3 inflict weakness 2 and weakness 25 to electricity
Curse Of Living Death: Cursebound 1, 2, 3, and 4 inflict weakness 2 to vitality and void damage, -1 Fortitude saves, weakness 25 to vitality and void damage, and -2 Fortitude saves
Curse Of The Mortal Warrior: Cursebound 1, 2, 3, and 4 inflict weakness 2 to spell damage, -1 saves vs. spells, weakness 20 to spell damage, and -2 saves vs. spells
Curse Of The Sky's Call: Suffers a penalty vs. forced movement equal to the current cursebound severity
Curse Of Torrential Knowledge: Cursebound inflicts a penalty to Will saves of equal severity
Divine Aegis: (R) Upon attempting a save vs. magic, gives self +1 vs. non-divine magical effects and -1 vs. divine effects until the start of the next turn
Epiphany At The Crossroads: (F) While dying, gains the effects of an Augury, loses the dying condition, gains a wounded level, regains 40 HP, and can Stand once per day
Greater Mysterious Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes, critical failures on Will saves are normal failures, and failed Will saves inflict half damage
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Mysterious Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Nudge The Scales: Can choose during daily prep to be healed by vitality healing or void healing
Magic
Spell Slots: D10: 2; D1: 4; D2: 4; D3: 4; D4: 4; D5: 4; D6: 4; D7: 4; D8: 4; D9: 5; DC1: 5 Focus Points: 3 Attack: Divine: +32 (charisma; legendary) Spell DC: Divine: 42 (charisma; legendary)
Spells:
Access Lore (D3 Foc): (1) Gives self legendary proficiency in a chosen Lore skill for 1 min
Ancestral Defense (D3 Foc): (R) Self gains the better of two rolls on the triggering Will save
Ancestral Form (D6 Foc): (2) Self becomes quasi-corporeal, gaining a 25 fly Speed and resistance 10 to all damage other than force, spirit, and ghost touch, or double this to non-magical and precision damage, while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +2 gives +5 resistance)
Ancestral Touch (D1 Foc): (1) Touch inflicts 2d4 HP mental and frightened 1 (save Will inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and frightened 2) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Armor Of Bones (D3 Foc): (1) Gives self resistance 3 to cold, electricity, fire, piercing, and slashing for 1 min (heightened +1 gives +1 resistance)
Battlefield Persistence (D3 Foc): (R) Gives self +2 on the triggering save, and raises the save level by 2 vs. incapacitation effects
Brain Drain (D1 Foc): (2) R30' Inflicts 1d8 HP mental and allows using the target's memories for a Recall Knowledge check (save basic Will also negates Recall Knowledge) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Claim Undead (D6 Foc): (2) Gives command of target undead for 10 min; target ignores self-destructive orders (save Will initial and after each rd inflicts stunned 1 and confused for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure gives control with saves only upon self-destructive orders)
Cloak Of Shadow (D1 Foc): (1) 20' emanation around willing touched reduces bright light to dim and conceals the target for 1 min; the target can shed the cloak, and the spell ends if another picks it up
Darkened Sight (D4 Foc): (2) R60' Target gains greater darkvision for 1 min
Delay Affliction (D3 Foc): (2) R30' Restores 3d8 HP to the target and attempts to counteract 1 affliction to delay its effects for 1 hr once per target per day (heightened +1 restores +1d8 HP and counteracts +1 affliction)
Dread Secret (D6 Foc): (2) R60' Inflicts on 6 targets frightened 1 and 1 damage of a known weakness type or suppression of a known resistance until the start of the next turn (save Will negates frightened; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3)
Dust Storm (D4 Foc): (2) R120' 20' burst obscures vision, requires breath holding, and inflicts 1d6 HP slashing for 1 min; water creatures suffer double HP (heightened +2 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Flaming Fusillade (D6 Foc): (2) Allows casting Ignition with 1 action for 1 min (heightened 9th Ignition inflicts +9 HP)
Ignition (PC1): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts 2d4 HP fire (2d6 HP fire if a melee attack), or double HP plus 1d4 HP persistent fire on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP initial and persistent)
Incendiary Aura (D1 Foc): (2) 10' emanation inflicts 2d4 HP persistent fire on creatures that take fire damage for 1 min (heightened +2 inflicts +1d4 HP and increases the radius by 5')
Interstellar Void (D3 Foc): (2) R30' Inflicts 3d6 HP cold and fatigued (save basic Fortitude) while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Life Link (D1 Foc): (1) R30' Restores 1d4 HP to the target and transfers up to 3 Hit Points of damage from the first attack on the target each rd to self for 1 min (heightened 3rd affects 2 targets, restores 3d4 HP, and transfers 5 Hit Points from each target to self; 6th affects 3 targets, restores 6d4 HP, and transfers 10 Hit Points; 9th affects 4 targets, restores 9d4 HP, and transfers 15 Hit Points)
Life-Giving Form (D6 Foc): (2) Causes self to emit light equivalent to a torch, gives resistance 5 to precision and weakness 5 to void, gives unarmed attacks +1d4 HP vitality damage, and allows touch to restore 6d8 HP once per target or inflict 3d4 HP vitality for 1 min (heightened +1 gives +1 resistance and weakness and touch restores +1d8 HP or inflicts +1 HP)
Moonlight Bridge (D6 Foc): (2) R30' Creates a 10'x120' bridge with AC 10, Hardness 30, 60 Hit Points, and immunity to all damage other than force, spirit, and ghost touch that can only be crossed by allies for 10 min (heightened +1 increases length by 20', width by 5', and Hit Points by 20)
Parch (D1 Foc): (2) R60' Inflicts -1 checks and DCs for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts -2 checks and DCs; water creatures worsen save by 1 degree, and liquid-free creatures are immune) (heightened 4th affects 4 targets)
Revel In Retribution (D6 Foc): (1) Gives self an extra reaction each rd to use Reactive Strike, and success on a Reactive Strike gives 5 temporary Hit Points, for 1 min (heightened +1 gives +1 temporary Hit Point)
Soul Siphon (D1 Foc): (1) R30' Inflicts 1d4 HP void and drained 1, and gives self an equal number of temporary Hit Points (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and drained 2) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Spray Of Stars (D1 Foc): (2) 15' cone inflicts 2d4 HP fire and dazzled for 3 rd (save reflex inflicts half HP and dazzled for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and dazzled for 1 min) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Tempest Form (D6 Foc): (2) Self becomes air, water, or mist, loses item armor bonuses, gains resistance 10 to physical damage and immunity to precision damage, can pass through cracks, does not need to breathe, cannot cast spells, and gains a 20' fly Speed or gains a 20' swim Speed and can inflict 1d6 HP electricity on melee attackers, while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +2 gives +5 resistance and inflicts +1 HP electricity)
Tempest Touch (D1 Foc): (1) Touch inflicts 1d4 HP bludgeoning, 1d4 HP cold, and -10 Speed until the end of the next turn (save Fortitude inflicts half HP and -5 Speed; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP bludgeoning and cold)
Thunderburst (D3 Foc): (2) R100' 20' burst inflicts 2d6 HP bludgeoning, 2d6 HP sonic, and deafened for 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and deafened for 1 hr) (heightened +2 inflicts +2d6 HP bludgeoning and sonic and extends affect by 5')
Weapon Trance (D1 Foc): (1) Self gains proficiency with martial weapons equal to simple weapon proficiency while sustained for up to 1 min; first successful weapon Strike each rd automatically Sustains the spell as a free action
Whirling Flames (D3 Foc): (2) R30' 2 5' bursts inflict 5d6 HP fire (save basic Reflex) (heightened +2 adds another 5' burst and inflicts +3d6 HP)

Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Divine)
Flames: Knows the Incendiary Aura divine spell
Gifted Power: +1 rank 9 spell slot for a mystery granted spell

Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Divine)
Life: Knows the Life Link divine spell
Lore: Knows the Brain Drain divine spell
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Divine)
Oracular Clarity: Has 1 10th-rank spell slot
Oracular Providence: +1 10th rank spell slot
Revelation Spells: Has a focus pool
Tempest: Knows the Tempest Touch divine spell
Blaze Of Revelation: (F) While at cursebound 4, can cast 1 revelation spell each rd without spending Focus Points for 1 min; afterward, must attempt a DC 40 Fortitude save, suffering drained 2 until next daily prep, drained 4 until next daily prep, or death on success, failure, or critical failure
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare 2 additional cantrips each day or add 2 additional cantrips to repertoire
Conduit Of Void And Vitality: (2) (Cursebound) Casting a 3-action signature Harm or Heal restores or inflicts on 1 target additional Hit Points equal to 1d8 * cursebound severity
Diverse Mystery: Can cast an initial or advanced revelation spell from another mystery, increasing cursebound severity and suffering the mystery's cursebound 1 effects
Divine Access: Can learn 3 cleric spells granted by a deity with a shared domain
Divine Effusion: Can cast 2 additional spells of different ranks after spell slots in each rank are exhausted once per day
Foretell Harm: (F) (Cursebound) Target of a damaging non-cantrip spell takes additional damage equal to the spell rank at the beginning of its turn once per rd, once per target per day
Knowledge Of Shapes: (F) (Cursebound) Uses Reach Spell or Widen Spell
Magic Sense: Has continuous 1st-rank Detect Magic effects that increase to 3rd-rank during Seek
Meddling Futures: (F) (Cursebound) Randomly gives self a Strike with +1 attack and +2 damage, a +1 Perception check or skill action, a spell cast with increased damage or healing equal to the spell rank, or a +10' Stride; cursebound 3 increases these bonuses to +6 damage, +2 check, spell rank + 3 damage or healing, or +20 Speed, and using a different action requires a successful DC 6 flat check
Mysterious Repertoire: Knows 1 spell from a different tradition
Mystery Conduit: (F) (Cursebound) Subsequent casting of an instantaneous spell of up to rank 5 does not expend a spell slot
Nudge The Scales: (1) (Cursebound) R30' Target regains 42 HP
Oracle Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine tradition
Paradoxical Mystery: Can select 1 spell from an accessible domain during daily prep to cast as a revelation spell
Portentous Spell: (1) Subsequent spell inflicts -2 on reaction attacks and skill tests, plus fascinated until the start of the next turn on any targets that suffer damage or fail to save
Quickened Casting: (F) Reduces the time required to cast a spell of rank 7 or lower by 1 action once per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Read Disaster: 10 min contemplation reveals whether the results of a proposed action up to 30 min in the future will be generally bad
Revelation's Focus: Refocus restores all Focus Points
Roll The Bones Of Fate: (1) (Cursebound) R30' Randomly causes 1 of 4 effects once per 10 min: gives self or an ally the better of 2 rolls on the next attack or skill check; inflicts on a target the worse of 2 rolls on the next attack or skill check (save Will negates); both of the previous; forces all within range to roll twice on their next attack or skill check, giving the better roll if the higher is even and the worse if it is odd
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
Steady Spellcasting: Can negate spellcasting disruption with successful DC 15 flat check
Surging Might: (1) Subsequent spell ignores resistance 20 to spirit, vitality, and void
The Dead Walk: (2) (Cursebound) R30' 2 spell attacks (cursebound 2 or 3 gives 3 or 4 attacks) each inflict 4d6 HP spirit and can flank with allies or each other
Trial By Skyfire: (1) (Cursebound) 10' emanation inflicts 2d6 HP fire (cursebound 3 inflicts 4d6 HP in a 15' emanation) (save basic Reflex) at the end of each turn for 1 min; a Sustain suppresses the effects for 1 rd
Waters Of Creation: (2) (Cursebound) 15' emanation restores 10d6 HP (cursebound 3 restores 10d8 HP)
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area instantaneous spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone instantaneous spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone instantaneous spell by 10'
Notes
Validation Errors:
Class Feats Allocation: 10 available vs. 45 allocated
Conduit Of Void And Vitality Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 16 and mystery feature
Oracle Mystery Allocation: 1 available vs. 8 allocated
